FuncDef: This command specifies that RADIUS, TACACS+, and LDAP servers are monitored for 3 seconds each at 30 second intervals. Servers that are not configured will have 3 seconds of idle time. If in this process a server is found to be unreachable, or a previously unreachable server starts responding, a trap will be sent based on the type of the server.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the polling interval for RADIUS, TACACS+, and LDAP servers. Values-6 to 1500. ParamDefault: Default- 30
